name: Sakura
text: Hey, is it really true that it's a juicy job? You're not planning something fishy again, are you?

name: Gangster
text: Don't be ridiculous! Why would we lie to you!

name: Sakura
text: Well, if that's the case...
It was understandable for Sakura to be suspicious.
As we followed the gangster, we completely left the bustling neighborhoods and came to a dimly lit area with few passersby.

name: Me
text: (A lot of assaults and kidnappings happen in this area... This is a hot spot for crime.)

name: Sakura
text: If you're up to something I'll give you another beating.

name: Gangster
text: Please believe me! My big sis still has some work to do and I know that I'm not the best person to lead the way, but...

name: Sakura
text: This guy, his personality is different now...

name: Gangster
text: Heheh...
The man's attitude had completely changed, perhaps from getting a good beating from Sakura.

name: Me
text: (By the looks of it, he isn't up to anything fishy... and if he tried anything, Sakura's fists would fly.)

name: Me
text: Anyway, what's this work you're talking about? I'm about ready for you to tell us...

name: Gangster
text: Huuuuh!? Why the hell do I have you tell you!? Brat!!

name: Sakura
text: Hey!! Be nice and tell us!

name: Gangster
text: Of course!! Right away!! Ehrm... so the work is...

name: Me
text: (What's up with the difference in how he treats me and Sakura...)
It seemed like this guy was still looking down on me since I hadn't participated in the fight at all.

name: Gangster
text: As for details, it's a mercenary job. What you'd call bodyguard work.

name: Gangster
text: Some big shot customer is urgently gathering talented individuals, and my big sis was also asked to help.

name: Sakura
text: A bodyguard? I don't want to do anything bad.

name: Gangster
text: No, no! No need to worry!

name: Sakura
text: Reeeally?

name: Gangster
text: If I'm not mistaken, it's about escorting cargo or something like that...

name: Gangster
text: Well, to be honest, I don't know the exact details either.

name: Sakura
text: Hmm...?

name: Me
text: (Escorting cargo? So they're transporting something that they expect to be attacked...?)
Is what I wanted to ask, but I decided to stay quiet since he was treating me with contempt.

name: Gangster
text: I heard it's definitely going to be dangerous. That's why the compensation is amazing. From what I've heard... lend me your ear for a moment.

name: Sakura
text: What is it, what is it...?

name: Sakura
text: Ehhh~!? That much~!?
Sakura jumped up, her eyes turning into dollar signs.

name: Gangster
text: Did that get you motivated?

name: Sakura
text: We'll do it! We'll definitely do it! Right, Fumachin!?

name: Me
text: What? Me too?

name: Sakura
text: Of course! Let's both get some pocket money and have a fancy dinner~♪

name: Me
text: N-Not a bad idea, I guess...

name: Gangster
text: Oh! We've arrived! It's just over there!!

name: Gangster
text: Faust-san! I've brought someone! Two highly skilled soldiers!!

name: Faust
text: Highly-skilled-soldiers?
We had arrived at an abandoned construction site. There were about 20 scary-looking men already gathered.
The one leading them was a female soldier with a bizarre appearance, as if her entire body was mechanized.

name: Faust
text: I-don't-believe-you... You're-saying-children-like-them-are-highly-skilled-soldiers...?

name: Gangster
text: Don't judge them by their appearance!! True, they look like stupid kids, but their skills are polished as hell!!

name: Faust
text: Is-that-so...?

name: Sakura
text: Eeeh!? A robot... woman?

name: Faust
text: I-am-"Faust."
The woman introduced herself with a electronic-sounding voice and turned her machine-covered face toward us.

name: Me
text: (Her whole body is mechanized like a cyborg...? She's no ordinary person.)

name: Men
text: What?! They're just some green little brats!

name: Men
text: Shoo shoo! This isn't playtime for kiddies!

name: Men
text: Or do you want us to teach you how to play like adults? Gyahahah!!!!
The gathered men started to jeer at us one after another.

name: Me
text: (They're a pretty boorish bunch. But I get why they're looking down on us...)

name: Sakura
text: Ughhh! How rude!!!

name: Sakura
text: Mercenary work is easy!! I'll have you know that the almighty and world-renowned Taimaー

name: Sakura
text: Mgmph!?
I had hurriedly covered Sakura's mouth.

name: Sakura
text:
Mgmghghgh!? Nhgngngh~!? 
(F-Fumachin!? What are you doing~!?)

name: Me
text: (You moron!! What are you doing telling them who we really are! Take a look, all of them are right at home in shady dealings!)

name: Me
text: (There might be people from Nomad among them as well. If you say something rash we're in deep shit!!)
I had noticed as soon as we had arrived.
Among the men gathered, there were a few faces that I had seen in documents before.
All of them were well-known figures in underground society, and more than a few of them were suspected to be involved with the criminal organization Nomad.

name: Sakura
text: (Th-That means... if these guys are all villains, then this is a dirty job...?)

name: Me
text: (No, I'm not sure about that. They definitely aren't good guys, but it's possible they were just hired.)

Nomad's organizational form was fluid and difficult to grasp, and it couldn't be said as a rule that just because a member of Nomad was participating in something that it was a job for their organization.

name: Sakura
text: (Uhh, so...? What do we do, Fuma-kun?)

name: Me
text: (If anything, now my interest is piqued.)

name: Sakura
text: (Eh?)

name: Me
text: (This job. These guys, trying to find out what they're up to... It could be a fun little activity.)

name: Faust
text: They-seem-to-be-yapping-about-something... If-they-are-as-excellent-as-you-say, then-let's-put-their-skills-to-the-test. ーNow-do-it.
At Faust's orders, the mercenaries around us began to move.

name: Men
text:
▪ You're finally gonna let us wreak havoc!
▪ My body's all stiff from standing around.

name: Orc Mercenary
text: Okay, I'll have fun with the cute little miss over here.

name: Sakura
text: (Wh-What do we do, Fuma-kun!? Is it really okay for us to accept this part-time job!? Can I show him my real strength!?)

name: Me
text: (I guess you can? I'm starting to have fun as well. Go as crazy as you can without giving away that you're a Taimanin.)

name: Sakura
text: A-Alright! Got it!!
Sakura nodded, clenched her fists tightly, and turned towards the mercenaries.

name: Sakura
text: I was hoping you'd test my strength!! I'll show you the power of the mighty Sakura-chan, so bring it on!!

name: Orc Mercenary
text: You've got some nerve, huh!!! I don't hate feisty little girls!!!
The Orc mercenary immediately lunged at Sakura.

name: Me
text: (Well, in any case... I don't think Sakura should have any issues. She won't lose to mercenaries like those guys.)
I was thinking of pretending to join the fight and not doing much... but then right in front of me stepped a somewhat gloomy-looking female mercenary.

name: Female Mercenary
text: ...I'm Tsubaki. Right now, I am acting as a mercenary. I'll be the one to see what you can do.

name: Me
text: Ehm, no wait, uh...? I'm basically just here as her chaperone, so be gentle...

name: Tsubaki
text: Hehe... do you think this would count as a test of skill if I went easy on you?

name: Me
text: I guess you're right...
The female mercenary seemed to be fairly skilled. Even in her casual movements, she didn't have any openings.

name: Me
text: (Shit... I can't run away at this point, so I guess I have no choice but to do it!)
If it was just a test of skill, most likely she wouldn't kill me... please don't kill meー
While I wished for that, I reluctantly prepared for battle.
